lyrics:
6 contributorstwoseater lyricsverse 1
i wanna wake up in your arms i wanna set off your alarm
i wanna break into your car and i wanna take out the backseat
the one where you told me everything i thought id always wanted to hear
the one where you told me that its over

prechorus
and every time you look in your rearview mirror
i hope you see me
and all the stuff we did when we were back there together uh huh

chorus
i hope you like your twoseater no radio
key marks parallel to the pinstripes
windows broken your ttops stolen now its one of a kind thanks for the ride

verse 2
i gotta get the hell out of dodge
i just spent the whole night avoiding the cops
and i just dont think ill go to the clink
just cause i took out the backseat
remember you told me everything
i thought i always wanted to hear
and thats where you told me that its over

prechorus
and every time you look in your rearview mirror
i hope you see me
and all the stuff we did when we were back there together uh huh
see bowling for soup liveget tickets as low as 52you might also likechorus
i hope you like your twoseater no radio
key marks parallel to the pinstripes
windows broken your ttops stolen
now its one of a kind thanks for the ride

bridge
can you hear your radio
i bet you cant hear your radio
so youll never know i wrote this song for you
sorry that your tires are flat
no you really werent expecting that
i guess i got a little carried away
so when you look in your rearview mirror
i hope you see me there

chorus
i hope you like your twoseater no radio
key marks parallel to the pinstripes
windows broken your ttops stolen
now its one of a kind thanks for the ride

outro
no radio
twoseater
no radio
thanks for the ride
twoseater thanks for the ride
twoseater thanks for the rideembed
